summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Pine Gel Nail Polish Set Chameleon Shimmering Color and Black 7.5 ml LED UV Cured Soak Off Nail Gel for Nail Art Manicure Review Date: 2020/12/26 Store: pine Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 3.7 x 2.91 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890993'} Review Text: These are fun colors. I love that each bottle has the color at the top of the cap. So often it's hard to find the color you're looking for. I got a couple of sets from this company, and they're all quality. Review Title: Love the colors, and that each bottle has the color on the top of the cap. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Review Date: 2020/12/26 Store: Anzuo Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'} Review Text: These are fun colors; I'd say more New Years Eve party than Xmas. I like that it comes with stickers to mark the top of the caps, but I wish each bottle had the color at the top of the cap already, since it can take some time for the polish to dry. I guess you could write it down? So often it's hard to find the color you're looking for. I got a couple of sets from this company, and they're all quality. Review Title: Love the colors, more New Years Eve party than Xmas. Would have preferred color already on cap. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Organic Sweet Almond Oil and Fractionated Coconut Oil Bundle for Hair and Skin, 100% Pure and Natural, Hexane-Free, Moisturizing, For Healthy Skin, Silky Hair, Multiuse Body Oil, 16 fl. Oz X 2 Review Date: 2021/01/02 Store: Shiny Leaf Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Shiny Leaf', 'Scent': 'Almond Oil and Fractionated Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '32.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.62 x 5.04 x 2.48 inches; 2.23 Pounds', 'UPC': '781584950669'} Review Text: As another reviewer said, in much better detail so I'll keep my review brief, the coconut oil being refined does nothing for skincare. I assume the other is in the same boat, despite being unrefined. Which is a shame, since that is what I got them for. Oh well, partly my fault I guess for not reading the fine print. Review Title: Wish I'd seen "refined" before selecting. Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 8 PCS 40ML Mini Spray Bottles, FANDAMEI Fine Mist Plastic Spray Bottles, Empty Refillable Clear Atomizer for Cleaning, Travel, Essential Oils, Perfume, Makeup Liquids. Travel Size, Pink & Blue Review Date: 2021/02/01 Store: Fandamei Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Fandamei', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '40 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '8', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '8.46 x 5.79 x 1.42 inches; 5.93 Ounces'} Review Text: Excellent travel size, sturdy enough to withstand travel. Good price. The two colors make it a little easier for organization. Review Title: Sturdy, compact spray bottles. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Heyedrate Activated Charcoal Soap Bar and Face Wash | Organic, Vegan, Natural Soap made with Dead Sea Mud and Our Essential Oil Blend (1 Pack (5 Ounces)) Review Date: 2021/04/18 Store: Eye Love Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Eye Love', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural, Vegan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850436007827'} Review Text: I like the ingredients, not super in love with the scent, but it's faint and doesn't linger, so no problem really. This worked up a good lather, not the best, but better than others with a washcloth; the lather didn't disappear either so I didn't need to keep going back to the soap. It's a nice size, larger than others I've tried, and seems like it will last at least a week, probably longer. Non-daily use it could last much longer. As far as moisturizing, I can at least say it didn't dry me out, which is a plus. Review Title: Faint scent doesn't linger, good lather. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Scrunchie Holder Stands with 8 Pack Large Size Scrunchies - Acrylic Hair Ties Organizer for Teenage Girls and VSCO Girls Gift Stuff Review Date: 2021/04/30 Store: Beeager Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Color': 'Yellow,Gray,White', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Beeager', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 3.98 x 3.7 inches; 10.86 Ounces'} Review Text: A scrunchy stand is a great idea. The company went the extra distance here to include a nice assortment of scrunchies to go with it. Would make a great gift for someone. Comes in a nice cardboard box. Review Title: Nice variety, giftable. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Boho Wide Headband with Button, Stretchy Elastic Ear Saver Knotted Headwear Sport Athletic Yoga Gym Head Wrap Hair Accessories for Women,Youth(Type D) Review Date: 2021/05/04 Store: Heybe Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Material': 'Cloth', 'Fabric Type': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'Heybe', 'Item Form': 'Wrap', 'Unit Count': '3.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '11.02 x 7.87 x 0.59 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '782500152327'} Review Text: These are nice quality and variety, and the buttons hopefully will hold up and help out aching ears. But these aren't really giftable. I got these for someone who was complaining about ear aches from wearing masks all day, and they looked at them and went, "huh?" No directions, no picture of someone wearing them, just a plastic packet with the words "headbands with buttons". I shouldn't have to explain this. Just a picture of someone wearing these included in the packaging would be perfect, but don't be surprised if you get these as a gift for someone and find they're not using the buttons for their intended purpose. Review Title: Good variety, but no directions. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ZZLOVE Amino Acids Body Wash for Men Women Moisturizing Shower Gel with Milk Protein Hydrolysate and Natural Plant Extracts Review Date: 2021/09/14 Store: ZZLOVE Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'ZZLOVE', 'Scent': 'Honey, Papaya', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 3.03 x 2.95 inches; 14.39 Ounces'} Review Text: *I noticed the company removed Bath and Body Works (they might've meant bath and body wash, typos happen). Much better, so I'll bump my rating up to 3.5, or round up to 4.
__

I like the scent, and it works well as a body wash. I think the price is a bit high for the smaller bottle, but the amino acids may be worth it for you (for cleansing, volume, shine, etc). I'm rating it 3 stars, since I got a really nice body wash a while ago that was priced similarly but was in a pump bottle twice this size, and made in USA. So you may have to shop around a bit.

I'm also unclear why it mentions Bath and Body Works, since it doesn't seem to be associated with them? A bit bait and switchy, but probably innocent.

Came well packed with a stopper on the pump to prevent leakage and a sturdy cardboard box. Review Title: Nice light scent, foams/rinses well.* Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The purchase history reveals a strong preference for colorful, fun products with a focus on nail art and beauty, reflecting a creative enjoyment in personal aesthetics. The individual shows a consistent inclination toward non-toxic and cruelty-free products, as evidenced by frequent mentions of these features. Sentiment analysis highlights a general satisfaction with quality, particularly in nail products, while specific complaints arise regarding product packaging and features, like the lack of color indicators on caps.

Functional multi-use products also attract positive sentiment, suggesting a preference for versatility in purchases. Although generally satisfied with product performance, the buyer exhibits price sensitivity, particularly when comparing the value offered in terms of size and functionality versus cost. For example, their review of a body wash indicated a desire for better value compared to similar products encountered.

Gifting suitability and organization features are significant factors, especially in relation to beauty accessories and travel items. Overall, key preferences include visually appealing, high-quality items that offer convenience and practicality, alongside an emphasis on transparent and ethical product features.

target_interaction.title: The lavender and the rosemary really makes this smell unique.
target_interaction.text:
This has a really different, interesting scent. I was expecting the blanket "parfum" but the company actually lists the essential oils. What I was getting the most were lavender and even more so rosemary. Not your typical soap scent, but not unwelcome, either!

This box says this is exclusive to Amazon. I also like that it's for all skin types, yet helps with dry, itchy skin.

Came inside a paper box inside a baggie inside a bubble mailer, which is better protection than some other soaps I've received.
target_interaction.title_meta: GreenIVe Handcrafted Neem Bar Soap, Small Handmade Batches, Moisturize and Cleanse (1 Pack)
